Package de.leonheuer.mcguiapi.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
de.leonheuer.mcguiapi.gui.GUI
public class GUI extends Object
GUI class that contains items with different click actions. Each item can have another click action, and close actions can be defined. The GUI can also be formatted with a GUIPattern. It can be shown to any player and handles every annoying part about creating GUIs in minecraft.

    • setItem

      @NotNull public @NotNull GUI setItem(int index, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack, boolean stealable, @NotNull @NotNull Consumer<org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent> action)
      Sets an item at the given slot and registers an action to be executed when the item is clicked. Also sets whether the item can be stolen, i.e. taken out of the GUI.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the GUI slot
      itemStack - Item to be set
      action - Action to be executed when
      Returns:
      The current GUI instance
